changesets.comments:
renderer2: glsl rework

- memory leaking fixed
- annoying print of refs  #952 removed
- sanity check for max uniform values in GLSL_ParseDefinition added

renderer2: fix GLSL_SelectTexture selecting non existing textures fixes
#952

journals.notes: there is something similar on goldrush too
should be set higher priority as its rather impossible to debug stuff when testing it ..
